attributes.action: Have covid 19 vaccinations given 24:7 as this is a national emergency
attributes.additional_details: We are in the midst of a national emergency - the only way out is to vaccinate people as quickly as possible.  The over 80s could be prioritised for the daytime slots but over 70s, 60s and key workers could be given nighttime slots.  This will save many lives and prevent further devastation to our economy.
attributes.background: Have covid 19 vaccines given 24:7 as this is a national emergency

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
